attributes.action: To erect a Monument to Baroness Thatcher
attributes.additional_details: To petition Her Majesty's Government to erect in a prominent location a memorial monument in honour of The Right Hon. The Baroness Thatcher, LG, OM, FRS, PC, in recognition of her unsurpassed, insurmountable contribution to the greatness of stature of this United Kingdom as its first female Prime Minister.
